comment: * Line breaking constraints for single paragraph.

methods.name: public void setIndent(@Px @FloatRange(from = 0.0f) float firstWidth, @Px @IntRange(from = 0) int firstWidthLineCount)
methods.comment:
* Set indent for this paragraph.
         *
         * @param firstWidth the line width of the starting of the paragraph
         * @param firstWidthLineCount the number of lines that applies the firstWidth
         * @see #getFirstWidth()
         * @see #getFirstWidthLineCount()

methods.name: public void setTabStops(@Nullable float[] tabStops, @Px @FloatRange(from = 0) float defaultTabStop)
methods.comment:
* Set tab stops for this paragraph.
         *
         * @param tabStops the array of pixels of tap stopping position
         * @param defaultTabStop pixels of the default tab stopping position
         * @see #getTabStops()
         * @see #getDefaultTabStop()

methods.name: public float getWidth()
methods.comment:
* Return the width for this paragraph in pixels.
         *
         * @see #setWidth(float)

methods.name: public float getFirstWidth()
methods.comment:
* Return the first line's width for this paragraph in pixel.
         *
         * @see #setIndent(float, int)

methods.name: public int getFirstWidthLineCount()
methods.comment:
* Return the number of lines to apply the first line's width.
         *
         * @see #setIndent(float, int)

methods.name: public float[] getTabStops()
methods.comment:
* Returns the array of tab stops in pixels.
         *
         * @see #setTabStops

methods.name: public float getDefaultTabStop()
methods.comment:
* Returns the default tab stops in pixels.
         *
         * @see #setTabStops

methodNames: public void setIndent(@Px @FloatRange(from = 0.0f) float firstWidth, @Px @IntRange(from = 0) int firstWidthLineCount)
public void setTabStops(@Nullable float[] tabStops, @Px @FloatRange(from = 0) float defaultTabStop)
